boardgame.name: Die Aufsteiger
The Climbers
The Climbers XL
Vers Le Haut
boardgame.description: They gazed at the large structure of colorful blocks neatly stacked before them. The goal was simple: climb to the highest level possible. Getting there was more challenging than originally thought. Only one climber will make it to the top. Will it be you?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your goal is to climb to the highest level of the structure. To help with your climb, you may move and rotate blocks. Ladders can be used to climb large distances. Your blocking disk will prevent other players from using a specific block. Use your tools wisely and at the right time to make the best possible moves in your adventure to the top!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Brand spanking new. Just arrived from Germany. Unfortunately, Chili Games has not discovered styrofoam, so the game box is indented in 2 bottom corners. Since Chili uses rather strange boxes, this is only a cosmeitc blemish to the box. The game is fine, and the box shows no signs of splitting. English rules provided. This is a very heavy, all wood game. Shipping will be via UPS and cost $15. Local buyers (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m in Golden, CO) can pick up from me and avoid shipping costs.
